teamBuff.name: Resonance Liberation: Supernal Stellarealm
teamBuff.desc: When a party member uses {Intro Skill} within the {Inner Stellarealm}, it evolves into the Supernal Stellarealm. Within the effective range of the {Supernal Stellarealm}, for every 0.1% of Shorekeeper's Energy Regen, all party members gain a 0.01% increase of Crit. DMG, up to 25%.

teamBuff.name: Outro Skill: Binary Butterfly
teamBuff.desc: All nearby party members' DMG is Amplified by 15%.

teamBuff.name: Sequence Node 2: Night's Gift and Refusal
teamBuff.desc: The {Outer Stellarealm} now increases the ATK of all team members by 40%.
